EmailTemplate.name: Elements Fonts Contest
EmailTemplate.subject: Envato Elements Fonts Contest - $4,500 up for grabs!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name},
Shane here from Envato, hope you're doing well!
I wanted to contact you personally to let you know about an exciting new Fonts Contest open to all Envato Elements contributors!
We're looking for the best Web Fonts as a lead up to a big marketing push on Fonts. We're putting up $4,500 USD in cash prizes, so start uploading your best Fonts for a chance to win!
The contest runs until Friday 17th March 2017.
Here are the details...
The Prizes:
Serif Fonts: Best 2 Serif Web Fonts win $500 each Sans-Serif Fonts: Best 2 Sans-Serif Web Fonts win $500 each Script Fonts: Best 2 Script Web Fonts win $500 each Handwritten & Decorative Fonts: Best 2 Handwritten & Decorative Web Fonts win $500 each
Extra Bonus Prize:
The most web fonts uploaded + published during the contest wins an extra $500
How To Enter:
The contest runs until Friday 12th March 2017. No entries will be accepted after that time. To enter the ‘Best Item Prize’, you must upload and ‘publish’ 1 or more fonts before the closing date of the contest. Be sure to tick the Web Fonts box when uploading. For more information about uploading Fonts on Elements go here: https://help.contributors.elements.envato.com/hc/en-us/articles/218115438-Fonts As a contributor you’re eligible to win multiple ‘Best Item Prizes’. Only items that meet our quality standards are eligible to win. We may disable or delete any items that fail to meet our standards.
Read the full Terms and Conditions over on the forums. TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Thanks and good luck!
{!User.FirstName}
--
Envato
http://envato.com
This email and its attachments may contain confidential information. If you have received this email in error, I'd appreciate you letting me know and deleting it.
